history:
Its experience was increased from 6600 to 7920 with the fourth batch of changes of [[Updates/12.31|Update 12.31]]. It was later increased to 8712 with the sixth batch of changes. Its loot was decreased in 25% with the ninth batch of changes of the Hunting Grounds Rebalancing.

Its experience was decreased from 8712 to 7310 and its loot reduced in 4% with the balancing changes on {{OfficialNewsArchive|6086|April 15, 2021}}.
name: Cobra Scout
bestiarytext: When Scarlett Etzel turned towards the shadows, her loyal followers turned away from her. Her change in tactics and the more covert approach has led to the hiring of shady characters to reinforce the order. Cobra Scouts are a vital backbone of Scarlett's forces. While they are often used for small errands and basic reconnaissance missions, their true purpose is to act as an extension of Scarlett's reach. They are sent out to all corners of the known world and receive their orders directly from her. They are often the first and probably last glimpse of the complex Cobra network for an outsider to witness.
sounds: Think I can't see you? Think again...
primarytype: Members of the Order of the Cobra
strategy: Knights should use [[Chivalrous Challenge]] to bring them into melee range and kill them, while other vocations should keep moving as ranged creatures attack less often in these cases.
